Render Word Doc REport

util_generate_word_doc_report.Rd

Produces a word doc report using the `printable_report.qmd` found in the `inst` folder.

Usage

util_generate_word_doc_report(
  df_input_speaker_info = NULL,
  df_input_response,
  file_name,
  temp_file = TRUE
)

Arguments

df_input_speaker_info

A `data.frame` that contains general info about a speaker, provided by the user. Run `data("df_input_speaker_info")` to produce an example.

df_input_response

A `data.frame` containing the referent names and their response. Run `data("df_input_response_example")` or `data("df_input_response_previous_example")` for example.

Examples

data("df_input_speaker_info_example")
data("df_input_response_example")
util_generate_word_doc_report(
  df_input_speaker_info = df_input_speaker_info_example,
  df_input_response = df_input_response_example)
